Author contributions Conceptualization and design of the study: A.D.J., E.G.S., M.M.W., R.S. Designed and constructed DNA vectors: A.D.J., K.S. with contributions from C.W.M. Conducted autochthonous lung modeling: A.D.J., M.K.T. Performed histology stains: A.D.J., F.A., R.S. Western Blot and ALK Antibody generation: K.S., I.H. Drug analysis in 3D cultures: M.N., R.S. Prepared Tuba-seq libraries from mouse lung: A.D.J., L.A. Designed the computational pipeline, methodology, and formal analysis: E.G.S., K.S. D.A.P. Analysis of human tumor sequencing data: S.S., S.D.S, E.G.S, E.S.S. RNA-seq/ATAC-seq generation and analysis: A.D.J., S.K., H.C., O.G., B.B. Wrote the manuscript: A.D.J., E.G.S., M.M.W., R.S. Resources: M.M.W., R.S. Correspondence should be addressed to: Rocio Sotillo: r.sotillo@dkfz-heidelberg.de mwinslow@stanford.edu Competing interest statement M.M.W. and D.A.P. are co-founders of, and hold equity in, Guide Oncology, Inc. S.S, S.D.S, and E.S.S., are employees at Foundation Medicine, Inc., with an equity interest in Roche. 23 9 2025 497744 10.1158/2159-8290.CD-24-1417 23 08 2025 29 09 2025 30 09 2025 01 10 2025 Oncogenic fusions of EML4 and ALK occur in ~5% of lung adenocarcinomas.
